results.title: Effects of simvastatin on neuroprotection and modulation of Bcl-2 and BAX in the rat quinolinic acid model of Huntington's disease.
results.text_hl: In the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treated groups (both pretreated and non-pretreated), @<m>DISEASE_Striatonigral_degeneration_infantile</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537500 @@@striatal lesion@@@ size was about 36% smaller while neuronal counts where higher than in the vehicle treated ones at 2 weeks.

citations.NLM: Patassini S, Giampà C, Martorana A, Bernardi G, Fusco FR. Effects of simvastatin on neuroprotection and modulation of Bcl-2 and BAX in the rat quinolinic acid model of Huntington's disease. Neurosci Lett. 2008 Dec 19;448(1):166-9. PMID: 18938217
citations.BibTeX: @article{18938217, title={Effects of simvastatin on neuroprotection and modulation of Bcl-2 and BAX in the rat quinolinic acid model of Huntington's disease.}, author={Patassini S and Giampà C and Martorana A and Bernardi G and Fusco FR}, journal={Neurosci Lett}, volume={448}, number={1}, pages={166-9}}

results.title: Role of Rho Kinase Inhibition in the Protective Effect of Fasudil and Simvastatin Against 3-Nitropropionic Acid-Induced Striatal Neurodegeneration and Mitochondrial Dysfunction in Rats.
results.text_hl: Role of Rho Kinase Inhibition in the Protective Effect of @CHEMICAL_fasudil @CHEMICAL_MESH:C049347 @@@Fasudil@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Against @CHEMICAL_3_nitropropionic_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C015392 @@@3-Nitropropionic Acid@@@-Induced @<m>DISEASE_Striatonigral_degeneration_infantile</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537500 @@@Striatal Neurodegeneration@@@ and @DISEASE_Mitochondrial_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D028361 @@@Mitochondrial Dysfunction@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Ahmed LA, Darwish HA, Abdelsalam RM, Amin HA. Role of Rho Kinase Inhibition in the Protective Effect of Fasudil and Simvastatin Against 3-Nitropropionic Acid-Induced Striatal Neurodegeneration and Mitochondrial Dysfunction in Rats. Mol Neurobiol. 2016 Aug;53(6):3927-3938. PMID: 26169112
citations.BibTeX: @article{26169112, title={Role of Rho Kinase Inhibition in the Protective Effect of Fasudil and Simvastatin Against 3-Nitropropionic Acid-Induced Striatal Neurodegeneration and Mitochondrial Dysfunction in Rats.}, author={Ahmed LA and Darwish HA and Abdelsalam RM and Amin HA}, journal={Mol Neurobiol}, volume={53}, number={6}, pages={3927-3938}}

results.title: Comparative neuroprotective profile of statins in quinolinic acid induced neurotoxicity in rats.
results.text_hl: Additionally, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (10, 20 mg/kg), @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (30 mg/kg) and @CHEMICAL_Fluvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077340 @@@fluvastatin@@@ (10 mg/kg) significantly decrease the @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNF-alpha@@@ level and @<m>DISEASE_Striatonigral_degeneration_infantile</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537500 @@@striatal lesion@@@ volume in @CHEMICAL_Quinolinic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017378 @@@quinolinic acid@@@ treated animals indicating their anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects.

citations.NLM: Kalonia H, Kumar P, Kumar A. Comparative neuroprotective profile of statins in quinolinic acid induced neurotoxicity in rats. Behav Brain Res. 2011 Jan 1;216(1):220-8. PMID: 20696189
citations.BibTeX: @article{20696189, title={Comparative neuroprotective profile of statins in quinolinic acid induced neurotoxicity in rats.}, author={Kalonia H and Kumar P and Kumar A}, journal={Behav Brain Res}, volume={216}, number={1}, pages={220-8}}
